code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Blueprint Diff & Merge
    [Infra_LoadBalancer] --> idle
    idle --> left_loaded : LOAD_LEFT
    left_loaded --> ready : LOAD_RIGHT
    ready --> ready : LOAD_BASE
    ready --> ready : LOAD_LEFT
    ready --> ready : LOAD_RIGHT
    ready --> diffing : DIFF [Infra_RedisCache]
    diffing --> diff_complete : DIFF_DONE
    ready --> diff_complete : DIFF_ALL [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    diff_complete --> diff_complete : SHOW_SUMMARY [Infra_IngressController]
    diff_complete --> diff_complete : SHOW_UNIFIED [Infra_WorkerNode]
    diff_complete --> diff_complete : SHOW_PATCH [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    diff_complete --> merging : MERGE [Infra_WorkerNode]
    merging --> merge_complete : MERGE_AUTO [Infra_IngressController]
    merging --> conflict : CONFLICT_DETECTED [Infra_WorkerNode]
    conflict --> merge_complete : TAKE_LEFT
    conflict --> merge_complete : TAKE_RIGHT
    diff_complete --> merge_complete : MERGE_LEFT [Infra_RedisCache]
    diff_complete --> merge_complete : MERGE_RIGHT [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    merge_complete --> merge_complete : EXPORT [Infra_IngressController]
    merge_complete --> diff_complete : BACK
    conflict --> diff_complete : BACK
    diff_complete --> diff_complete : DIFF_ALL
    diff_complete --> ready : RESET
    ready --> idle : CLEAR
    diff_complete --> idle : CLEAR
    merge_complete --> idle : CLEAR
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
